     35 	flagIndexPath    = dynamicDefault{
     36 		display: "${dir}/livegrep.idx",

     39 	flagRevision                = flag.String("revision", "HEAD", "git revision to index")
     40 	flagUrlPattern              = flag.String("url-pattern", "https://github.com/{name}/blob/{version}/{path}#L{lno}", "when using the local frontend fileviewer, this string will be used to construt a link to the file source on github")
     41 	flagName                    = flag.String("name", "livegrep index", "The name to be stored in the index file")
     42 	flagNumRepoUpdateWorkers    = flag.String("num-repo-update-workers", "8", "Number of workers fetch-reindex will use to update repositories")
     43 	flagRevparse                = flag.Bool("revparse", true, "whether to `git rev-parse` the provided revision in generated links")

     45 	flagArchived                = flag.Bool("archived", false, "whether to index repositories that are archived on github")
     46 	flagHTTP                    = flag.Bool("http", false, "clone repositories over HTTPS instead of SSH")

     53

     55 	flagOrgs  = stringList{}

     59 func init() {
     60 	flag.Var(&flagIndexPath, "out", "Path to write the index")
     61 	flag.Var(&flagRepos, "repo", "Specify a repo to index (may be passed multiple times)")
     62 	flag.Var(&flagOrgs, "org", "Specify a github organization to index (may be passed multiple times)")
     63 	flag.Var(&flagUsers, "user", "Specify a github user to index (may be passed multiple times)")
     64 }

     66 const Workers = 8

     68 func main() {
     69 	flag.Parse()
     70 	log.SetFlags(0)
     71 
     72 	if *flagDeprecatedBL != "" {
     73 		log.Fatalln(BLDeprecatedMessage)
     74 	}
     75 
     76 	if flagRepos.strings == nil &&
     77 		flagOrgs.strings == nil &&
     78 		flagUsers.strings == nil {
     79 		log.Fatal("You must specify at least one repo or organization to index")
     80 	}
     81 
     82 	if *flagInstallation {
     83 		if *flagGithubKey == "" {
     84 			log.Fatal("-installation-key requires passing a github key, via either -github-key or $GITHUB_KEY")
     85 		}
     86 		*flagHTTP = true
     87 		*flagHTTPUsername = "x-access-token"
     88 	}
     89 
     90 	var ignorelist map[string]struct{}
     91 	if *flagIgnorelist != "" {
     92 		var err error
     93 		ignorelist, err = loadIgnorelist(*flagIgnorelist)
     94 		if err != nil {
     95 			log.Fatalf("loading %s: %s", *flagIgnorelist, err)
     96 		}
     97 	}
     98 
     99 	var h *http.Client
    100 	if *flagGithubKey == "" {
    101 		h = http.DefaultClient
    102 	} else {
    103 		tok := &oauth2.Token{AccessToken: *flagGithubKey}
    104 		h = oauth2.NewClient(
    105 			context.Background(),
    106 			oauth2.StaticTokenSource(tok),
    107 		)
    108 	}
    109 
    110 	gh := github.NewClient(h)
    111 
    112 	if *flagApiBaseUrl != "" {
    113 		if !strings.HasSuffix(*flagApiBaseUrl, "/") {
    114 			log.Fatalf("API base URL must include trailing slash: %s", *flagApiBaseUrl)
    115 		}
    116 		baseURL, err := url.Parse(*flagApiBaseUrl)
    117 		if err != nil {
    118 			log.Fatalf("parsing base url %s: %v", *flagApiBaseUrl, err)
    119 		}
    120 		gh.BaseURL = baseURL
    121 	}
    122 
    123 	repos, err := loadRepos(gh,
    124 		flagRepos.strings,
    125 		flagOrgs.strings,
    126 		flagUsers.strings)
    127 	if err != nil {
    128 		log.Fatalln(err.Error())
    129 	}
    130 
    131 	repos = filterRepos(repos, ignorelist, !*flagForks, !*flagArchived)
    132 
    133 	sort.Sort(ReposByName(repos))
    134 
    135 	config, err := buildConfig(*flagName, *flagRepoDir, repos, *flagRevision)
    136 	if err != nil {
    137 		log.Fatalln(err.Error())
    138 	}
    139 	configPath := path.Join(*flagRepoDir, "livegrep.json")
    140 	if err := writeConfig(config, configPath); err != nil {
    141 		log.Fatalln(err.Error())
    142 	}
    143 
    144 	index := flagIndexPath.Get().(string)
    145 
    146 	args := []string{
    147 		"--out", index,
    148 		"--codesearch", *flagCodesearch,
    149 		"--num-workers", *flagNumRepoUpdateWorkers,
    150 	}
    151 	if *flagNoIndex {
    152 		args = append(args, "--no-index")
    153 	}
    154 	if *flagRevparse {
    155 		args = append(args, "--revparse")
    156 	}
    157 	if *flagSkipMissing {
    158 		args = append(args, "--skip-missing")
    159 	}
    160 	args = append(args, configPath)
    161 
    162 	if *flagFetchReindex == "" {
    163 		fr := findBinary("livegrep-fetch-reindex")
    164 		flagFetchReindex = &fr
    165 	}
    166 
    167 	log.Printf("Running: %s %v\n", *flagFetchReindex, args)
    168 	cmd := exec.Command(*flagFetchReindex, args...)
    169 	cmd.Stdout = os.Stdout
    170 	cmd.Stderr = os.Stderr
    171 	if *flagGithubKey != "" {
    172 		cmd.Env = append(os.Environ(), fmt.Sprintf("GITHUB_KEY=%s", *flagGithubKey))
    173 	}
    174 	if err := cmd.Run(); err != nil {
    175 		log.Fatalln("livegrep-fetch-reindex: ", err)
    176 	}
    177 }

    179 func findBinary(name string) string {
    180 	paths := []string{
    181 		path.Join(path.Dir(os.Args[0]), name),
    182 		strings.Replace(os.Args[0], path.Base(os.Args[0]), name, -1),
    183 	}
    184 	for _, try := range paths {
    185 		if st, err := os.Stat(try); err == nil && (st.Mode()&os.ModeDir) == 0 {
    186 			return try
    187 		}
    188 	}
    189 	return name
    190 }

    192 type ReposByName []*github.Repository
    193 
    194 func (r ReposByName) Len() int           { return len(r) }
    195 func (r ReposByName) Swap(i, j int)      { r[i], r[j] = r[j], r[i] }
    196 func (r ReposByName) Less(i, j int) bool { return *r[i].FullName < *r[j].FullName }
    197 
    198 func loadIgnorelist(path string) (map[string]struct{}, error) {
    199 	data, err := ioutil.ReadFile(path)
    200 	if err != nil {
    201 		return nil, err
    202 	}
    203 
    204 	lines := strings.Split(string(data), "\n")
    205 	out := make(map[string]struct{}, len(lines))
    206 	for _, l := range lines {
    207 		out[l] = struct{}{}
    208 	}
    209 	return out, nil
    210 }
    211 
    212 type loadJob struct {
    213 	obj string
    214 	get func(*github.Client, string) ([]*github.Repository, error)
    215 }
    216 
    217 type maybeRepo struct {
    218 	repos []*github.Repository
    219 	err   error
    220 }
    221 
    222 func loadRepos(
    223 	client *github.Client,
    224 	repos []string,
    225 	orgs []string,
    226 	users []string) ([]*github.Repository, error) {
    227 
    228 	jobc := make(chan loadJob)
    229 	done := make(chan struct{})
    230 	repoc := make(chan maybeRepo)
    231 
    232 	var jobs []loadJob
    233 	for _, repo := range repos {
    234 		jobs = append(jobs, loadJob{repo, getOneRepo})
    235 	}
    236 	for _, org := range orgs {
    237 		jobs = append(jobs, loadJob{org, getOrgRepos})
    238 	}
    239 	for _, user := range users {
    240 		jobs = append(jobs, loadJob{user, getUserRepos})
    241 	}
    242 	go func() {
    243 		defer close(jobc)
    244 		for _, j := range jobs {
    245 			select {
    246 			case jobc <- j:
    247 			case <-done:
    248 				return
    249 			}
    250 		}
    251 	}()
    252 	var wg sync.WaitGroup
    253 	wg.Add(Workers)
    254 	for i := 0; i < Workers; i++ {
    255 		go func() {
    256 			runJobs(client, jobc, done, repoc)
    257 			wg.Done()
    258 		}()
    259 	}
    260 	go func() {
    261 		wg.Wait()
    262 		close(repoc)
    263 	}()
    264 	var out []*github.Repository
    265 	for repo := range repoc {
    266 		if repo.err != nil {
    267 			close(done)
    268 			return nil, repo.err
    269 		}
    270 		out = append(out, repo.repos...)
    271 	}
    272 
    273 	return out, nil
    274 }
    275 
    276 func runJobs(client *github.Client, jobc <-chan loadJob, done <-chan struct{}, out chan<- maybeRepo) {
    277 	for {
    278 		var job loadJob
    279 		var ok bool
    280 		select {
    281 		case job, ok = <-jobc:
    282 			if !ok {
    283 				return
    284 			}
    285 		case <-done:
    286 			return
    287 		}
    288 		var res maybeRepo
    289 		res.repos, res.err = job.get(client, job.obj)
    290 		select {
    291 		case out <- res:
    292 		case <-done:
    293 			return
    294 		}
    295 	}
    296 }
    297 
    298 func filterRepos(repos []*github.Repository,
    299 	ignorelist map[string]struct{},
    300 	excludeForks bool, excludeArchived bool) []*github.Repository {
    301 	var out []*github.Repository
    302 
    303 	for _, r := range repos {
    304 		if excludeForks && r.Fork != nil && *r.Fork {
    305 			log.Printf("Excluding fork %s...", *r.FullName)
    306 			continue
    307 		}
    308 		if excludeArchived && r.Archived != nil && *r.Archived {
    309 			log.Printf("Excluding archived %s...", *r.FullName)
    310 			continue
    311 		}
    312 		if ignorelist != nil {
    313 			if _, ok := ignorelist[*r.FullName]; ok {
    314 				continue
    315 			}
    316 		}
    317 		out = append(out, r)
    318 	}
    319 
    320 	return out
    321 }
    322 
    323 func getOneRepo(client *github.Client, repo string) ([]*github.Repository, error) {
    324 	bits := strings.SplitN(repo, "/", 2)
    325 	if len(bits) != 2 {
    326 		return nil, fmt.Errorf("Bad repository: %s", repo)
    327 	}
    328 
    329 	ghRepo, _, err := client.Repositories.Get(context.TODO(), bits[0], bits[1])
    330 	if err != nil {
    331 		return nil, err
    332 	}
    333 	return []*github.Repository{ghRepo}, nil
    334 }

    336 type IndexedResponse struct {
    337 	Page  int
    338 	Org   string
    339 	Repos []*github.Repository
    340 	err   error
    341 }
    342 
    343 func callGitHubConcurrently(initialResp *github.Response, concurrencyLimit int, firstResult []*github.Repository, gClient *github.Client, method string, org string, user string) ([]*github.Repository, error) {
    344 	pagesToCall := initialResp.LastPage - 1
    345 
    346 	// create the matrix of results and add the first one - this is so we can maintain order
    347 	// which unfortunately takes an extra O(n) pass
    348 	resultsMatrix := make([][]*github.Repository, pagesToCall+1)
    349 	resultsMatrix[0] = firstResult
    350 
    351 	semaphores := make(chan bool, concurrencyLimit)
    352 	resStream := make(chan *IndexedResponse, pagesToCall)
    353 	var wg sync.WaitGroup
    354 
    355 	ctx, cancel := context.WithCancel(context.Background())
    356 	defer cancel()
    357 
    358 	for i := 1; i <= pagesToCall; i++ {
    359 		wg.Add(1)
    360 
    361 		go func(ctx context.Context, page int, c chan *IndexedResponse, s chan bool, w *sync.WaitGroup) {
    362 			s <- true // aquire semaphore
    363 			defer w.Done()
    364 
    365 			var repos []*github.Repository
    366 			var err error
    367 			if method == "org" {
    368 				repos, _, err = gClient.Repositories.ListByOrg(ctx, org, &github.RepositoryListByOrgOptions{
    369 					ListOptions: github.ListOptions{PerPage: 100, Page: page},
    370 				})
    371 			} else if method == "user" {
    372 				repos, _, err = gClient.Repositories.List(ctx, user, &github.RepositoryListOptions{
    373 					ListOptions: github.ListOptions{PerPage: 100, Page: page},
    374 				})
    375 			}
    376 
    377 			c <- &IndexedResponse{
    378 				Page:  page,
    379 				Repos: repos,
    380 				Org:   org,
    381 				err:   err,
    382 			}
    383 			<-s // release semaphore
    384 		}(ctx, i+1, resStream, semaphores, &wg) // + 1 because pages are 1 based, and we already called 1st to start with
    385 	}
    386 
    387 	// close the channel in the background
    388 	go func() {
    389 		wg.Wait()
    390 		close(resStream)
    391 		close(semaphores)
    392 	}()
    393 
    394 	for res := range resStream {
    395 		if res.err != nil {
    396 			return nil, res.err // cancel will be called after this early return
    397 		}
    398 		resultsMatrix[res.Page-1] = res.Repos // Page index is 1 based
    399 	}
    400 
    401 	// Now flatten the matrix and return it
    402 	var buf []*github.Repository
    403 	for _, res := range resultsMatrix {
    404 		buf = append(buf, res...)
    405 	}
    406 
    407 	return buf, nil
    408 }

    410 func getOrgRepos(client *github.Client, org string) ([]*github.Repository, error) {
    411 	log.Printf("Fetching repositories for organization: %s", org)
    412 
    413 	opt := &github.RepositoryListByOrgOptions{
    414 		ListOptions: github.ListOptions{PerPage: 100},
    415 	}
    416 	repos, resp, err := client.Repositories.ListByOrg(context.TODO(), org, opt)
    417 
    418 	if err != nil {
    419 		return nil, err
    420 	} else if resp.FirstPage == resp.LastPage { // if no more pages, return early
    421 		return repos, nil
    422 	}
    423 
    424 	// when flagMaxConcurrentGHRequests is 1 (default), behaves synchronously
    425 	return callGitHubConcurrently(resp, *flagMaxConcurrentGHRequests, repos, client, "org", org, "")
    426 }
    427 
    428 func getUserRepos(client *github.Client, user string) ([]*github.Repository, error) {
    429 	log.Printf("Fetching repositories for user: %s", user)
    430 
    431 	opt := &github.RepositoryListOptions{
    432 		ListOptions: github.ListOptions{PerPage: 100},
    433 	}
    434 	repos, resp, err := client.Repositories.List(context.TODO(), user, opt)
    435 	if err != nil {
    436 		return nil, err
    437 	} else if resp.FirstPage == resp.LastPage { // if no more pages, return early
    438 		return repos, nil
    439 	}
    440 
    441 	// when flagMaxConcurrentGHRequests is 1 (default), behaves synchronously
    442 	return callGitHubConcurrently(resp, *flagMaxConcurrentGHRequests, repos, client, "user", "", user)
    443 }

    445 func writeConfig(config []byte, file string) error {
    446 	dir := path.Dir(file)
    447 	if err := os.MkdirAll(dir, 0755); err != nil {
    448 		return err
    449 	}
    450 	return ioutil.WriteFile(file, config, 0644)
    451 }
    452 
    453 func buildConfig(name string,
    454 	dir string,
    455 	repos []*github.Repository,
    456 	revision string) ([]byte, error) {
    457 	cfg := config.IndexSpec{
    458 		Name: name,
    459 	}
    460 
    461 	for _, r := range repos {
    462 		if *flagSkipMissing {
    463 			cmd := exec.Command("git",
    464 				"--git-dir",
    465 				path.Join(dir, *r.FullName),
    466 				"rev-parse",
    467 				"--verify",
    468 				revision,
    469 			)
    470 			if e := cmd.Run(); e != nil {
    471 				log.Printf("Skipping missing revision repo=%s rev=%s",
    472 					*r.FullName, revision,
    473 				)
    474 				continue
    475 			}
    476 		}
    477 		var remote string
    478 		if *flagHTTP {
    479 			remote = *r.CloneURL
    480 		} else {
    481 			remote = *r.SSHURL
    482 		}
    483 
    484 		var password_env string
    485 		if *flagGithubKey != "" {
    486 			password_env = "GITHUB_KEY"
    487 		}
    488 
    489 		cfg.Repositories = append(cfg.Repositories, &config.RepoSpec{
    490 			Path:      path.Join(dir, *r.FullName),
    491 			Name:      *r.FullName,
    492 			Revisions: []string{revision},
    493 			Metadata: &config.Metadata{
    494 				Github:     *r.HTMLURL,
    495 				Remote:     remote,
    496 				UrlPattern: *flagUrlPattern,
    497 			},
    498 			CloneOptions: &config.CloneOptions{
    499 				Depth:       int32(*flagDepth),
    500 				Username:    *flagHTTPUsername,
    501 				PasswordEnv: password_env,
    502 			},
    503 		})
    504 	}
    505 
    506 	return json.MarshalIndent(cfg, "", "  ")
    507 }
